articles.title: Alan Carr fans defend him after homophobic abuse while filling in on Radio 2 - Daily Mail
articles.description: Alan Carr was defended by some of his devoted fans after the talented host was subjected to abuse with 'homophobic undertones' on Twitter on Monday.
articles.content:
Alan Carr's devoted fans have jumped to his defence after the talented host was subjected to abuse with 'homophobic undertones' on Twitter.
